post:
**Presenting a brand new web-hosting template - EpElegant, Designed by ElitePixels.net . **

![](http://i.imgur.com/8FLw4Aj.png)

**Features:**

1. Neat, Layered PSD files : http://i.imgur.com/qAXhVZY.png 
2. Clean Coded HTML/CSS 
3. Integrated with WHMCS
4. Has 5 Pages: Home/Shared/Dedi/VPS/Text Page
5. 4 Different Versions: Blue/Red/Blue-Black/Red-Black color combinations.
6. VPS Page has a unique slider. 
7. Dedicated Page with neat tables.

And many many more options!

**Price:**

30$ - HTML & WHMCS files.


50$ - HTML/WHMCS and PSD files.


**Copies Sold**: 2/xx


Price for reselling rights: 500$ BIN. All rights will be sold to you. ElitePixels will no longer sell it, if you buy the reseller rights. 

PM me for live demo. If you are really interested to buy.

**Payment Methods: **
PayPal/Payza/Skrill/Webmoney
